summary: Website for a business called AuraFlora, themed with unique pastel colours to feel high-classed and abstract.
architectural_notes: Use a blend of unique pastel colours throughout the design to convey a high-class, abstract feel

existing_features.title: Create a visually striking hero section with the AuraFlora brand name, a refined tagline, and a full-viewport abstract background that blends soft pastel tones (such as blush rose, lavender mist, sage green, and champagne gold). The layout should feel elevated and editorial.

Build an 'About' section describing AuraFlora as a premium brand. The section should use asymmetric layout with pastel accent shapes or watercolour-style decorative elements, conveying exclusivity and artistry.

Create a 'Services' or 'Offerings' section showcasing 3–4 sample luxury service cards for AuraFlora. Each card should have a pastel-tinted background unique to it, elegant hover effects, and use refined iconography or abstract illustrations.

Add a gallery or featured showcase section with a grid or masonry layout displaying abstract pastel imagery placeholders. This section should reinforce the high-end, artistic brand identity of AuraFlora.
Build a contact or 'Get in Touch' section with a minimal, elegant form (name, email, message fields) and a submit button styled to match the AuraFlora pastel theme.

Design a sticky navigation bar with the AuraFlora logo/wordmark and smooth-scroll links to all sections. The navbar should be translucent with a frosted-glass or soft pastel blur effect to maintain the abstract, premium aesthetic.
Add a footer with the AuraFlora name, brief brand descriptor, social media placeholder links, and copyright text. Style it with a deep or contrasting pastel tone to complete the page.

Apply a cohesive global design system across the entire AuraFlora website: a curated pastel palette (blush rose, lavender, sage, champagne/gold), serif or high-fashion display fonts for headings, clean sans-serif for body, generous whitespace, and subtle abstract decorative elements (floating blobs, soft gradients, translucent overlays) to achieve a high-class, abstract visual identity.

In the ContactSection, make the email address 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' an interactable mailto link (mailto:aurafloraaf@gmail.com). Replace the studio/location text with 'Mumbai'. Replace any 'hours' or availability text with a response time notice such as 'We revert within 24–48 hours'.
In the ContactSection, add an interactable Instagram link displaying '@aura._.flora_' that opens 'https://www.instagram.com/aura._.flora_/' in a new tab.

In the Footer component, remove the Facebook and Pinterest social icons/links entirely. Keep only the Instagram icon/link and update it to point to 'https://www.instagram.com/aura._.flora_/' opening in a new tab. Update all contact details in the footer to match: email 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' (as a mailto link), location 'Mumbai', and replace any hours text with '24–48 hour response time'.

Wire the enquiry/contact form so that on submission it composes and opens a mailto link to 'aurafloraaf@gmail.com' pre-filled with the submitted name, email, and message as the email body and subject. This should use a mailto: URI approach since no backend email service is available.
